subject: Doping (Sports)
Baseball
Human Growth Hormone
Witnesses
lead_paragraph: Yankees pitcher Andy Pettitte testified in federal court on Wednesday that he was only 50 percent sure about Roger Clemens telling him that he had used human growth hormone.
snippet: Yankees pitcher Andy Pettitte testified in federal court on Wednesday that he was only 50 percent sure about Roger Clemens telling him that he had used human growth hormone.
